name: Meep Protector
description:
Meep Protector is a very simple platform game that tries to test an innovative game mechanic that can possibly be improved in the near future.

The game itself consists on guiding 3 little creatures to safety while having to control them at the same time as the player's main character.

It is still in a very under developed state as it was made during a 48 hour Game Jam so it only has 3 basic levels but which still allows to test out the core mechanic.

It was made using free assets from itch.io and some other assets from other places.
